title: Sun Life Stadium Selects G4S to Design and Deliver State-of-the-Art Security Solution as Part of $400m Renovation
text:
G4S
Stadium Modernization Project will Help it Compete for Future NFL Super Bowls and Other Major Events
JUPITER, Fla. , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- G4S, a global integrated security company, today announced its partnership with Sun Life Stadium, home of the Miami Dolphins, to deliver an all-new, state-of-the-art security solution.
G4S will design, integrate and manage the facility's security system and operations. The first phase, to be completed this year, includes multiple solutions from G4S' portfolio. In addition to providing security personnel, G4S' AMAG Technology will provide Symmetry™, an intelligent, networked solution that manages access control, video and security. G4S will also deliver and manage a video management system comprised of high-resolution 30 mega pixel surveillance cameras. The second phase, to begin in 2016, will include the development and management of an ultramodern security Command Center. This will serve as the hub of Sun Life Stadium's security operations.
"Delivering a positive fan experience is our top priority, and for the Dolphins organization that starts with ensuring the highest levels of security," said Todd Boyan , Senior Vice President of Operations for the Miami Dolphins. "G4S takes a progressive approach to security management – creating continuity in a one-stop solution. With G4S, we will stay ahead of the curve to maintain maximum safety and comfort for our fans."
Many sporting facilities operate with multiple security vendors, which can create complexity and risk. With G4S, Sun Life Stadium benefits from the scale of a global leader in security solutions – one provider with one cohesive offering.
"G4S is working with the Dolphins' security and IT functions to migrate from individual systems to a comprehensive and integrated security offering," said John Kenning , Regional CEO, North America at G4S. "We believe this stadium will become a model for how security is delivered and managed at other major sporting and events venues."
About G4S
G4S is the leading global, integrated security company, specializing in the provision of security services and solutions to customers. Our mission is to create material, sustainable value for our customers and shareholders by being the supply partner of choice in all of our markets.
